subdisciplines.name: Mathematical Methods of Physics
subdisciplines.description: The application of mathematical techniques to solve problems in physics, such as differential equations, calculus of variations, and group theory.

subdisciplines.name: Quantum Field Theory
subdisciplines.description: The study of the quantization of classical fields, such as electromagnetic fields and gravitational fields, and the resulting quantum field theory.

subdisciplines.name: General Relativity
subdisciplines.description: The study of the geometric and dynamic properties of spacetime in the presence of matter and energy, including black holes, gravitational waves, and cosmology.

subdisciplines.name: Statistical Mechanics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the behavior of large collections of particles, based on the principles of statistical mechanics, such as the Boltzmann distribution and the partition function.
